title: DOOM the Movie
body: <p>I just read <a href="http://www.tomshardware.com/hardnews/20041022_132909.html" title="DOOM the movie?">this news</a> about <a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0419706/" title="that's right, DOOM the movie.">Doom (the movie)</a>.  I can't imagine it being any good, but that probably won't stop me from seeing it.  I always thought that Aliens was about as close of a Doom experience as you could get, so we'll see if they can top that.  Hopefully it'll stick to the same plot of the video game.</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-25

DOOM the Movie

I just read
